articles.author: Lewis Jackson
articles.title: Chevron LNG workers in Australia to pause strike action until Friday - Reuters.com
articles.description: Workers at Chevron's (CVX.N) liquefied natural gas facilities in Australia have agreed to pause planned strike action for one day, hours before they were due to begin industrial act…
articles.content: SYDNEY, Sept 6 (Reuters) - Workers at Chevron's (CVX.N) liquefied natural gas facilities in Australia have agreed to pause planned strike action for one day, hours before they were due to begin indus… [+2099 chars]
